Illusions

Typing Game && Space Invaders

The other day I came across a video on twitter and I thought I had discovered gold! In this video, there was a game made with Unity3D where you could type words and then destroy approaching enemies.

Earlier this year I disovered a similar game called ZType.

Although the twitter game didn't exactly meet my expectations, it was completely different from ZType, I enjoyed reading the article about Epistory and the challenge of the game's story design.

Written on January 12, 2016
